com.att.android.arodatacollector.main

Class AROCollectorCustomDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Dialog
      • com.att.android.arodatacollector.main.AROCollectorCustomDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.DialogInterface, android.content.DialogInterface.OnKeyListener, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class AROCollectorCustomDialog
extends android.app.Dialog
implements android.content.DialogInterface.OnKeyListener
    Represents a custom dialog in the ARO Data Collector which is used for confirmation messages and errors.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AROCollectorCustomDialog.Dialog_CallBack_Error
      The Dialog_CallBack_Error enumeration specifies constant values that describe the types of callback methods associated with error message dialogs.
      static class  AROCollectorCustomDialog.Dialog_Type
      The Dialog_Type enumeration specifies constant values that describe the types of custom dialogs used in the ARO Data Collector.
      static interface  AROCollectorCustomDialog.DialogKeyListner
      Exposes a method for listening to Key events from custom ARO Data Collector dialogs.
      static interface  AROCollectorCustomDialog.ReadyListener
      Exposes a method for listening to responses from AROCollectorCustomDialog.Dialog_CallBack_Error dialogs.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface android.content.DialogInterface

        android.content.DialogInterface.OnCancelListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnClickListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnDismissListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnKeyListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnMultiChoiceClickListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnShowListener

        Parameters:
        context - The application context.
        theme - The dialog theme.
        type - The dialog type. One of the values of the AROCollectorCustomDialog.Dialog_Type enumeration.
        readyListener - The dialog call back listener on main activity.
        listner - The dialog event listener.
